name: vCard Editor
body:
###  vCard Editor
***

This simple tool let you edit a vcf file. Or as know as a vCard file.

![vCardEditor](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/169070/9863134/7451d17a-5b0b-11e5-80d6-56d7a70fd5e2.jpg)


### Thanks
- **Thought.vCards** for his wonderful library of parsing and generating vcf format. http://www.thoughtproject.com/Libraries/vCard/

- **MVP pattern** from this example : https://github.com/lennykean/NoteCards
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
